name: Jumpy Flags
description:
Hi all!

Jumpy flags it's my tenth game of a personal game a week challenge, in this week I had the objective of making a local multiplayer game and here it is!

Combines the classic frogger style with a capture the flag mode!.
Every match has a different map combination!

This game needs 2 people to play it (or one capable to play and compete with himself/herself)

CONTROLS:
Player 1: WASD
Player 2: Directional arrows

Game music:
"Rocket Power" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
